mapper.select: SELECT A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI || AD.GU || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE FROM ADT_REG A JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY A.POST_DATE
